text: The 2014–15 Oregon State Beavers women's basketball team represented Oregon State University during the 2014–15 NCAA Division I women's basketball season. The Beavers, led by fifth year head coach Scott Rueck, played their games at the Gill Coliseum and were members of the Pac-12 Conference. They finished the season 27–5, 16–2 in Pac-12 play to win the Pac-12 regular season title. They lost in the quarterfinals of the Pac-12 Women's Tournament to Colorado. They received at-large bid of the NCAA Women's Tournament where they defeated South Dakota State in the first round before getting upset by Gonzaga in the second round. ==Roster== ==Rankings== {| class="wikitable" style="white- space:nowrap;" |+ Ranking Movement Legend: ██ Increase in ranking. ██ Decrease in ranking.
